mapper.insert: insert into refund (payment_NUM, user_email, bizAccount_email, refund_amount, refund_holder, refund_bank, refund_account, refund_reason, refund_regdate) values (#{payment_NUM}, #{user_email}, #{bizAccount_email}, #{refund_amount}, #{refund_holder}, #{refund_bank}, #{refund_account}, #{refund_reason}, #{refund_regdate});
